issue: Test was skipping email delivery even with credentials configured
root_cause: Test script hardcoded to skip when UseSecureCredentials=true

solution_applied.change: Added logic to use configured credentials from email module

new_logic: Only skip if credentials not actually configured
expected_outcome: Email delivery tests should now attempt to send real emails using the configured Google Workspace credentials
next_steps: Should see actual email delivery attempts
Check georgest32@gmail.com inbox for test emails
If authentication fails, verify App Password is correct
